content.title: Congratulations
content.body:
You have successfully:

  • Configured two locales
  • Provided key-value pairs for the different texts used in a form
  • Provided RTL support for the widgets in the form while retaining position and content alignment for some widgets
  • Configured the i18n keys for the widgets in a form
  • Viewed the difference in the position of the widgets and content when the language of a mobile device is changed.

For more information on Internationalization, click here.
